name: Aman Shaukat
summary: Experienced Software Engineer with 3+ years of expertise in building scalable microservices and full-stack applications. Proven track record in migrating legacy systems, optimizing performance, and implementing secure authentication systems. Strong background in Java, Spring Boot, and cloud technologies.

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Migrated a legacy monolithic system to microservices architecture, enhancing manageability and scalability, reducing client issue resolution time by up to 80%
Built a custom unique ID generation system using timestamp-based metrics, cluster data, and IP sequence, achieving 20% faster query performance over UUIDs
Developed a Spring Boot logging library with AOP to standardize logs across 20+ microservices, reducing debugging time by 20% and improving traceability
Architected a Spring Boot, gRPC, and Redis caching system for RCS-enabled numbers via Jio API, using keyspace notifications and batch processing to optimize performance
Implemented OAuth-based authorization in microservices, strengthening security and enabling granular client data access
Led development of Google RCS messaging channel, integrating with vendors and increasing message volume by 15%
Enhanced code coverage from 30% to 80% using JUnit and Mockito, ensuring higher reliability and minimizing production bugs

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
responsibilities: Completed intensive enterprise-level Java and Spring Boot training program
Integrated Redis-based caching improving application response time by 20% and decreasing database load by 15%
Collaborated with engineering team to resolve 20+ production issues, minimizing downtime and ensuring system reliability
Recognized for quickly mastering new concepts and delivering results under tight deadlines

other_experience.title: Coding Tutor
responsibilities: Taught programming fundamentals using Scratch to junior students and advanced Python topics to university learners
Designed customized curricula and project-based learning modules improving student participation and concept retention
Mentored 50+ students across multiple platforms with consistent positive feedback for teaching effectiveness

projects.name: Ticket Booking System - Backend
description: Developed Spring Boot theatre booking platform with 27 RESTful APIs for authentication, event management, and ticket generation
Optimized real-time seat locking with Redis, eliminating overbooking incidents and integrated Cloudinary for image uploads
Automated PDF ticket generation with QR codes using iText and ZXing, achieving 95% email delivery success
Built secure JWT authentication with BCrypt and rule-based discount engine for tailored pricing
Collaborated with frontend developers ensuring efficient API integration for high-traffic booking periods

achievements: Codeforces: 1100+ rating with consistent problem-solving performance
HackerRank: 5-star rating across multiple programming domains
Google Kickstart: Global rank 2319 in October 2020 among 20,000+ participants
